comments.body: I  think this is something I missed porting back to v1alpha1 but matches what we [already have in v1beta1](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/api/discovery/v1beta1/types.go#L164-L165). The git diff is weird here because v1alpha1 is being removed at the same time v1 is being added, so it's treating everything as a rename (and catching changes I or others missed adding to v1alpha1).
I would suggest removing v1alpha1 in a separate commit (or maybe even a separate PR)
changing v1a1 -> v1 made this PR easy to review
